attributes.action: respectfully request the current Speaker of the House of Commons, Michael Martin MP, to resign.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Michael Martin MP no longer has the respect of his fellow MPs and is therefore unfit to remain in this post. His attempts to silence his critics and his performance is becoming increasingly embarrassing and is bringing the office of the Speaker and the authority of Parliament into disrepute.

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
